p: Table 3 shows the correlates associated with T. pallidum infection in males and females combined. They were spouse having syphilis (aOR = 38.51, 95% CI 7.12 to 208.16), injection drug use (aOR = 3.48, 95% CI 1.14 to 10.57), blood transfusion (aOR = 5.70, 95% CI 1.12 to 28.97), HBV infection (aOR = 2.76, 95% CI 1.00 to 6.92), and HCV infection (aOR = 8.34, 95% 3.01 to 19.84).
